attributes.action: In response to Covid -19 lock down freeze  Mortgages and household bills for all
attributes.additional_details: To create nationwide, community security for the the continued support of social and economic welfare of our countries workers. To ensure that workers can still contribute to the economic success of the country post lockdown.
attributes.background: To support all people who aren't able to pay for their homes, their energy and their food due to any imposed lock down. To ask the Government to freeze mortgages and household bills or to give all a interest free loan over the duration of Covid -19 lockdown. To ensure that all are financially safe.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302256

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
